Package zebra4j

Class PuzzleGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • zebra4j.AbstractPuzzleGenerator<Puzzle>
      • zebra4j.PuzzleGenerator
  • public class PuzzleGenerator
extends AbstractPuzzleGenerator<Puzzle>
    A generator for Puzzle

    You can use the same generator to create multiple different puzzles by calling the AbstractPuzzleGenerator.generate() method multiple times. All generated puzzles will have the same attributes and solution but will have different facts (clues).
